name: IBM DB2 Template - multiple disks
description: This template deploys IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition 10.5 on a Linux virtual machine.

metadata.longDescription: This template deploys IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition 10.5 on a Linux virtual machine.IBM DB2 is installed and configured with a single instance and database created.The DB2 instance, database data, logs and archive stored in separate partitions.

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description:
Flavor: VCPU = 2, Memory = 2GB
Attached Storage: Linux files systems = 10GB, 40GB, 10GB, 20GB)

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
IBM DB2
db2 instance 1, 1 database

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for DB2 10.5 - https://www.ibm.com/software/reports/compatibility/clarity/index.html
3. IBM Knowledge Center for DB2 10.5 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSEPGG_10.5.0
4. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
